Girls in white dresses with blue satin sashes Something to make my skin give all that Blushes Who wouldn't love an all-natural cream? Among Animetric's favorite things...
When the dog bites When the bee stings When I'm feeling sad I simply remember Animetric's favorite things And then I don't feel so bad.
